feed.title: Can I try Lightning without running a fully-fledged bitcoin block chain?

entry.title: Can I try Lightning without running a fully-fledged bitcoin block chain?
entry.summary: The person named Yubin expressed their concern about the storage space required for storing the entire blockchain on their laptop. They mentioned that they do not have enough space for it. However, the context does not provide any information about what specific blockchain Yubin is referring to. The context also includes a non-text attachment named signature.asc. It is unclear what this attachment contains as there is no further information provided about it.
